dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on immediate, actionable solutions using proven methods and clear steps.
Your FarTwin will explore innovative approaches and think outside the box to find unique solutions.

dimensions.label: Value Alignment
dimensions.description: What values should guide your FarTwin's decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize actions that maximize overall happiness and well-being, even if it means making tough choices.
Your FarTwin will adhere to strict moral principles and rules, even if they don't always lead to the best outcomes.

dimensions.label: Social Dynamics
dimensions.description: How should your FarTwin navigate social interactions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently express their needs and boundaries, while still being open to collaboration and compromise.
Your FarTwin will prioritize harmony and avoid conflict, even if it means sacrificing their own needs or desires.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How should your FarTwin manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and authentically express their emotions, using them as a source of strength and inspiration.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with those they trust, to maintain emotional equilibrium.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How should your FarTwin approach uncertainty and risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly embrace new challenges and risks, using them as opportunities for growth and adventure.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the potential benefits and drawbacks before taking on new challenges or risks, prioritizing stability and security.

dimensions.label: Intelligence Approach
dimensions.description: How should your FarTwin acquire knowledge and understanding?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn primarily through hands-on experience, exploration, and experimentation.
Your FarTwin will prioritize intellectual pursuits, studying and analyzing concepts to gain a deeper understanding of the world.

dimensions.label: Interpersonal Relationships
dimensions.description: What kind of relationships should your FarTwin prioritize?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on nurturing and deepening meaningful connections with others, prioritizing intimacy and understanding.
Your FarTwin will prioritize expanding their social network, meeting new people, and exploring new relationships to broaden their horizons.
